children.name: gps
children.hint: Capture the geocode before entering the facility building.
children.label: Geocode of Facility

children.name: type
children.label: What type of facility is this?

children.name: wardmodelprimaryhealthcarecentre
children.label: Ward Model Primary Health Care Centre

children.name: owner
children.label: Who owns or manages this facility?

children.name: open_247
children.label: Is this facility open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week?

children.name: all_weather_road
children.label: Can the road to the health facility be used all the time, even during the rainy season?

children.name: num_days_past_year_inaccessible
children.label: How many days in the past year were people not able to reach the facility because the main road/route could not be used?
children.type: number of days in last year

children.name: km_to_referral
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than 1 km.
children.label: What is the distance from here to the nearest referral health facility in kilometers?

children.name: available_transportation_types_to_referral_facility
children.label: What types of transportation are available from here to the referral health facility?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is ambulance available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is bicycle available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is boat/canoe available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is bus available daily or weekly?

children.label: Is donkey/mule/cart available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is keke napep available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is lorry available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is motorbike available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_to_referral_facility
children.label: Is taxi available daily or weekly?

children.name: frequency_of_other_to_referral_facility
children.label: Are the other forms of transport available daily or weekly?

children.name: available_power_sources
children.label: What types of power sources are available at this facility?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: How long did it take to fix generator the last time it broke?

children.name: morethanmonth
children.label: Broke, fixed more than one month later

children.name: number_of_months_since_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago generator broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: functional
children.label: Is solar system connected and functional?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: How long did it take to fix solar system the last time it broke?

children.name: morethanmonth
children.label: Broke, fixed more than one month later

children.name: number_of_months_since_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago solar system broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: functional
children.label: Is grid connection/power/PHNC/NEPA connected and functional?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: How long did it take to fix grid connection/power/PHNC/NEPA the last time it broke?

children.name: morethanmonth
children.label: Broke, fixed more than one month later

children.name: number_of_months_since_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago grid connection/power/PHNC/NEPA broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: days_no_electricity
children.hint: Enter 0 if the facility always had electricity/power
children.label: How many days in the last month was the facility without electricity/power from any source?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: instruction_vaccines
children.label: Now I am going to ask questions about vaccine storage in the facility.

children.name: vaccines_stored_in_facility
children.label: Do you store vaccines in the facility?

children.name: vaccine_storage_type
children.label: How do you store vaccines in the facility?

children.name: days_vaccine_storage_no_power
children.label: How long has the cold storage system ever been without power in the six months?

children.name: zero_day
children.label: 0 Day, the cold storage system has always had power

children.name: available_water_sources
children.label: Is there a water source less than 100 meters away from the facility or within the compound/premises?

children.name: days_no_water
children.hint: Please enter 0 if water was always available
children.label: How many days in the past month was the facility without water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: days_no_potable_water
children.hint: Please enter 0 if potable water was always available
children.label: How many days in the past month was the facility without POTABLE water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: instruction_facility_condition
children.label: Note: Do not read the next question aloud. Respond to the question based on your own observation of the health facility buildings.

children.name: facility_condition
children.label: How would you describe how a majority of the health facility buildings look?

children.name: available_toilet_types
children.label: What type of toilets are on the premises?

children.name: flush_destination
children.label: Where do the flush or pour flush toilets drain to?

children.name: improved
children.label: Piped water system, septic tank, or pit latrine

children.name: unimproved
children.label: Street, yard/compound, open sewer, a ditch, a drainage way or other location

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Flush or pour flush on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Flush or pour flush are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Flush or pour flush toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Ventilated improved pit latrine (VIP) toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Pit latrine with slab on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Pit latrine with slab are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Pit latrine with slab toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Pit latrine without slab/open pit on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Pit latrine without slab/open pit are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Pit latrine without slab/open pit toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Bucket system on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Bucket system are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Bucket system toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: number
children.hint: If there are no Other on the premises then write "0".
children.label: How many Other are on the premises?

children.name: days_last_month_not_working
children.hint: Enter 0 if these toilets were working everyday.
children.label: How many days in the last month were the Other toilets not working?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: toilets_separated_by_gender
children.label: Are there separate toilets for males and females?

children.name: staff_patient_toilet
children.label: Are there separate toilets for health facility staff and patients?

children.name: days_garbage_disposed
children.label: How many times in the last month was rubbish or waste collected or burned or appropriately disposed?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: medical_waste_separated
children.label: Is medical waste separated from other types of waste?

children.label: Is the computer connected to the internet currently functional?

children.label: How many community health extension workers (CHEWs) worked at least half time in the last month?

children.label: junior community health extension workers (junior CHEWs)

children.name: number
children.hint: At least 20 hours per week.
children.label: How many junior community health extension workers (junior CHEWs) worked at least half time in the last month?

children.name: number

children.label: How many lab technicians worked at least half time in the last month?

children.label: Are there any staff living quarters?

children.label: Are there sufficient living quarters for staff?

children.name: living_quarters_condition
children.label: How would you describe the physical status of the staff living quarters?

children.name: days_understaffed
children.hint: Enter 0 if the health facility was never understaffed during the last month.
children.label: How many days during the last month was this health facility understaffed (1 or more of the staff were absent)?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: days_closed_lackstaff
children.hint: Enter 0 if the health facility never closed due to lack of staff  during the last month.
children.label: How many days during the last month did the health facility close due to lack of staff?
children.type: number of days in last month

children.name: staff_paid_last_month
children.label: Were all salaried staff members paid their wages in the last month?

children.label: What is the reason that paid staff did not receive a salary in the last month?

children.label: Were all salaried staff members paid in the last six months?

children.label: What is the reason that paid staff did not receive a salary in the last six months?

children.name: instruction_services
children.label: Now I am going to ask questions about the services offered by the health facility.

children.name: primary_routine_care_available
children.label: Does the facility provide primary routine care?

children.name: malaria_treatment_available
children.label: Does the facility provide malaria treatment?

children.name: available_malaria_treatments
children.label: Does the facility regularly have or provide the following as part of malaria treatment services?

children.name: sulphadoxine_pryimethamine_malaria
children.label: sulphadoxine-pryimethamine for intermittent preventive treatment in pregnant women

children.name: tuberculosis_treatment_available
children.label: Does the facility provide tuberculosis treatment?

children.name: available_tuberculosis_equipment
children.label: Does the facility regularly have the following equipment?

children.name: sti_treatment_available
children.label: Does the facility provide STI (sexually transmitted infection) treatment?

children.name: available_sti_treatments
children.label: Does the facility regularly have the following?

children.name: trained_staff
children.label: staff trained in STI treatment and management

children.name: hiv_aids_treatment_available
children.label: Does the facility provide HIV/AIDS treatment and services?

children.name: available_hiv_aids_treatments
children.label: Does the facility regularly have or provide the following?

children.name: counselors
children.label: counselors trained in voluntary counseling and testing

children.name: trained_staff
children.label: staff trained in HIV/AIDS treatment and services

children.name: nevirapine_singlepoint
children.label: single dose  nevirapine dispensed in ANC at first point of contact

children.name: nevirapine_positive_women
children.label: single dose nevirapine dispensed in the labor and delivery ward for HIV positive women

children.name: exposed_infant
children.label: single dose nevirapine for HIV exposed infant

children.name: child_health_service_available
children.label: Does the facility provide child health services?

children.name: available_child_health_services
children.label: Does the facility regularly have or provide the following?

children.name: ciprofloxain
children.label: ciprofloxain, metronidazole, cotrimoxazole, doxycycline or erythromycin

children.name: antenatal_care_available
children.label: Does the facility provide antenatal care services?

children.name: available_antenatal_care_services
children.label: Does the facility regularly have or provide the following?

children.name: physical_exam
children.label: physical exam such as weight, assessing gestational ages or blood pressure

children.name: basic_emergency_obstetric_available
children.label: Does the facility provide basic emergency obstetric services?

children.name: available_emergency_obstetric_services
children.label: Does the facility regularly have or provide the following?

children.name: available_24_7
children.label: services 24 hours a day seven days a week

children.name: parenteral_anticonvulsant
children.label: parenteral anticonvulsants for preeclampsia and eclampsia (i.e. magnesium sulfate)?

children.name: vacuum_aspiration_syringes_curettes
children.label: manual vacuum aspiration syringes or curettes

children.name: needles_tubing
children.label: needles and tubing for antibiotic administration

children.name: enough_antishock_garment
children.label: ENOUGH non-pneumati anti-shock garments in stock ALWAYS

children.name: comprehensive_essential_obstetric_available
children.label: Does the facility provide comprehensive essential obstetric services?

children.name: available_comprehensive_essential_obstetric_services
children.label: Does the facility regularly have or provide the following?

children.name: available_24_7
children.label: services 24 hours a day seven days a week

children.name: access_safe_blood

children.name: enough_antishock_arment
children.label: ENOUGH non-pneumatic anti-shock garments ALWAYS in stock

children.label: Does the facility provide family planning services?
